app.name: Name
app.reviewMessage: Review the properties to be used for creation of connector '{{connectorName}}'. Click 'Finish' to create the connector.
app.resolvePropertyErrorsMsg: Resolve property errors, then click Validate
app.resolvePropertySucessMsg: All required configuration is complete. If desired, you can proceed to
app.unknownError: Unknown error - please consult your administrator
app.duplicateConnectorErrorMsg: Name already in use - please choose a different name.
app.cancelWarningMsg: All inputs will be lost.  Are you sure you want to leave?
app.deleteWarningMsg: The connector will be deleted, and cannot be undone.  Proceed?
app.connectorEmptyStateMsg: Please click 'Create a connector' to create a new connector.
app.filterSchemaInfoMsg: A comma-separated list of regular expressions for schema filtering (e.g schema1,schema2).  Click for more information about regular expressions:
app.filterTableInfoMsg: A comma-separated list of regular expressions for table filtering (e.g schema1.*,schema2.table1).  Click for more information about regular expressions:
app.schemaFilterHelperText: Schemas matching the regular expression filters will be excluded.
app.filterPageHeadingText: Select tables for change capture by entering comma-separated lists of regular expressions for schemas and tables.
app.tableFilterHelperText: Tables matching the regular expression filters will be excluded.
app.invalidFilterText: The expression(s) for table filtering are invalid.
app.noMatchingFilterExpMsg: No matching tables for the specified filters
app.clearFilterText: You can include all schemas and tables by clicking
app.filterExpressionResultText: tables available for change capture. You can enter regular expressions to filter.
app.clearFilterConfMsg:
This operation will clear all filtering expressions. 
Are you sure you want to proceed?
app.connectorPageHeadingText: This list shows all connectors that have been created.  You can create a new connector by clicking the 'Create a connector' button.
app.pageNotFoundMsg: This page couldn't be found.  If you think this is a bug, please report the issue.
app.invalidFilterExpText: The expression(s) for table filtering are invalid, please correct and try again.
